title: Rifka Takes a Bow
description: Rifka's parents are actors in the Yiddish Theater in New York, but one day Rifka finds herself center stage in a special role! A slice of immigrant life on New York's Second Avenue, this is a unique book about a vanished time and a place – the Yiddish theater in the early 20 th century―made real through the telling of the true life story of the 96-year-old author as a little girl.
author: Betty Rosenberg Perlov
